headline: Capital One Financial (NYSE:COF) Faces Investor Scrutiny Over Executive Compensation
summary: The recent submission of a shareholder proposal by John Chevedden targeting executive compensation practices at Capital One Financial (NYSE:COF) has drawn significant attention from investors. This proposal, set for discussion at the upcoming annual meeting, seeks to limit severance packages for top executives. During this period, the company's shares fell by 13.05%. This decline aligns with broader market challenges, as major indices, including the Nasdaq, entered a bear market amid tariff...

headline: Cap One-Discover deal detractors assail reported DOJ approval
summary: Capital One’s $35 billion purchase faces two remaining federal approvals – and plenty of critics who expect consumers will face higher costs.
